This game may be short, but what it lacks in time, it greatly makes up for in gameplay. With it's challenging puzzles, outstanding envornments and great story, this game is a must play.

The first time I heard of this game was when I came across a flashgame version of it. It was fun 2D, but it is even better 3D. This game has many puzzles, a talking machine that tries to insinuate something about you every second, and PORTALS. Things just got a lot more awesome with PORTALS to solve your puzzles! That's right, this game will have you playing it over and over and over again. Although this game is really fun and interesting, it is also very difficult. It may take minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, or even years to complete some of the puzzles. After you get to the next level though, you're on top of the world! Glados is there to cheer you up and congratulate you by telling you that you are homeless. The future is here, PORTALS are possible. 8.4/10
This was a triumph... making a note here, huge success

I doubt I even need to suggest that people play this game, but just in case, I will.  This is a very cool game.  Play as Chell, using a portal gun to go through increasingly difficult puzzlesl, because the robot GLaDOS tells you to.  She is one of the coolest antagonists in a video game you'll ever see.  Lots of twisted humor from GLaDOS, and a very fun  puzzle game.  The environments look great as well.

A certainly fun experience for a weekend, but with little to no replay value. On my first attempt I beat it in a little over 3 hours, but the realy sell is how much those 3 hours are still remembered over any similar game. 

9/10 for what it is. 
7/10 as a purchase.

Portal, ein Spiel, wo ich vor Jahren gesagt habe "das kauf ich mir nie" und nun hab ich es denn doch getan. Design und ein kleiner Story-Zusammenhang ist hier mit Half-Life 2 verbunden, was somit schonmal selbst noch im Jahre 2013 keine billig-veraltete Grafik ist und ebenso spannend unterhalten tut! Es macht echt Spaß und nun kann auch der 2. Teil in meine Sammlung aufgenommen werden! Hier zeigt Valve wieder einmal, das Sie ihr Handwerk vollends verstehen! Von mir 9/10 Kammerpunkte wert!

I really cant even describe how amazing this game is, you really just have to play it. You will not regret buying this game. i give it 10/10.

Elképesztően nagy ötlet, szórakoztatóak a fejtörők. Nehezek a pályák, de mégsem annyira, hogy Youtube-hoz kelljen fordulni. Az engine nagyszerűen üzemel. A poénok, hatalmasak és a játék feelingje is kéreti magát a folytatásra. Igaz a történet elég gyengécskére sikerült, és a játék is rövid lett. Ha valaki vágyik egy nagyon ötletes játékra, egyéni játékmenettel, nonstop lövöldözés nélkül akkor mindenképp ajánlom neki. Izgatottan fogok a 2. részhez.

Truly matched all the hype heaped upon it for years and years. A simple concept but scaling with difficulty and challenges. The quintessential "puzzle" style game, but one incorporated with brilliant level design. Throw in a basic story with a comical, maniacal villain and you have a must-buy title.

Into puzzle games? Yea, I know you're not. But (drumroll) are you into highly immersive psychological torture, insane murderous female robots, cute high-pitched voice turrets and portal guns? I know you are. So give your money to Valve already!
an amazing game that everyone should play but it is short .... its so cool and fun ^_^ im gonna get portal 2 later on ever one should play this awesome game!

I discovered it by chance long before the 'cake is a lie' thing became viral, and was genuinely surprised, amused and perplexed by the originality of it's design and storytelling. It's one of those games that shaped and defined a new subgenre; and it all started with a student project!


V e r d i c t : AWESOMESAUCE, which means nearly perfect

Portal is a fun puzzle-type game that can be played in a day.  The puzzles are well designed and the learning curve is built into the game.  It starts you off with simple puzzles and gradually complicates them by adding new elements one by one.  The story is simple, but it is the wit in the dialogue that makes this game well loved.

The achievements definitely make the game replayable, and the challenge maps are... well, definitely challenging.  I've played through this game several times in attempts to try to find all of the cameras, and you definitely need to look everywhere.

I would recommend this game to anyone looking for a well thought out puzzle game.

Com uma história de apenas 3 horas consegue ser um dos meus favoritos. Esse é o jogo mais envolvente que já joguei, não há como voce começar a jogar e não terminar, isso é um exemplo de como outros jogos deveriam ser. Jogo FPS estilo puzzle BEST EVER!
Court mais digne de sa réputation, Portal est un excellent jeu de réflexion moderne et exploitant une idée géniale.
Прикольная игра, стоит поиграть, если еще не делали этого.

This is a brilliant game. Period. 

Even now, so many years after it's release, I continue to play this game, and love it every bit of it. It's unique, polished, and damn fun to play. 

The game uses physics that have been tweaked from those of the Source engine's regular capability to support absolutely brilliant potential for puzzles and stunts, and the controls that you use to navigate these are tight as all hell, enabling for a smooth experience. The visuals, while somewhat dated, hold up decently and still provide for some atmospheric tension in the game's second act, with well designed textures and stages, and some nifty HDR lighting patched in for added flare. The most prominent aspect however is the games narrative, one that amuses the role of seemingly omniscient AI, GLaDOS. Her witty but sadistic humour is the driving force behind the story, and one that provides constant tension and wit until the finale.

It is short, however. And I mean really short. On my first play through, it clocked in to roughly over an hour and a half, start to finish. But it's still better than most linear 1st Person games. The replay value is not the greatest, with only a few challenges to play on your second run, and the environments you experience are not as varied or interesting as you would hope, instead limited to white corridors and rooms, and then later on slightly less futuristic corridors and rooms. However, this is simply not enough to hinder the overall experience.

Despite its short length, Portal still deserves a place in my games list, and hopefully yours too... It's brief, but unforgetable...

+ Ingenious physics and intellect puzzles
+ Unforgettable narration
+ Solid and tight control
-  Too short
 
8.5/10 ~ Amazing

EpicSouls (Sam)
Оригинальная игра, которую стоит поиграть!

Classic Valve title, not sure what else I can say.

With the release of Portal 2, the original might have been put into the shadows. It should not be forgotten however, since it is more forgiving on the system. 

Original idea... That's what the key is here. There's no dual deagle acog thermal or whatever thing someone has come up with. You only control a simple portal gun and have to use your brain to figure things out. Perfect for someone who hasn't played computer games, or is just starting.

Nothing really shocking here, just a solid title worth it's price.

8/10

Portal — настоящий шедевр. Самая смешная, оригинальная, интересная и стабильная игра за последнее время. И, пожалуй, единственная игра, в которой при убийстве финального босса хочется смеяться и плакать одновременно.
must play and still the best Meta-Game

Siempre cuando veía las promos me parecía algo aburrido. No pude estar mas equivocado, es una excelente juego, con un estupendo sentido del humor y puzzles interesantes. Prueben jugar de a dos, no tiene desperdicio.
Amazing one-of-a kind game everyone must play.

Portal is a puzzle game. Pretty average. Accept for the fact that you solve puzzles by MAKING PORTALS! I got this game in the Orange box bundle. Which you should do. Because stand alone portal is half the price of the orange box budle. Anyways...
You play as a woman named chell who was put in the aperture science enrichment centre (Or center) by her father. You then go along with what GLaDOS tells you to do, or maybe not...
This game has a short campaign (4 hours for me). But there are Advanced puzzles and time trials. This game is an amazing 10/10! A PERFECT SCORE!
So... Stop reading this and go buy it NOW! NOW! GO!

Welcome to the Aperture Science Computer-Aided Enrichment Centre. Hell this game was very good, this game wasnt anticipated to be very good but it almost went through the roof in sales, offering very different gameplay for Valve games, casting two portals on to portal capable tiles solving difficult puzzles, which I thought wa great, while GladOS is offering you cake all throughout this game.. Which.. I wont spoil it.. (Although that cake was delicious :D) This game is worth it and once you play Portal 2... *jaw drops*
